BY USING THE WEBSITE, SERVICES, AND/OR BY REGISTERING WITH US, YOU ACCEPT THE PRACTICES AND POLICIES OUTLINED IN THIS PRIVACY POLICY, AND YOU HEREBY CONSENT THAT WE WILL TRACK, COLLECT, USE, AND SHARE YOUR INFORMATION IN THE FOLLOWING WAYS.
Please note that we may need to retain certain information for recordkeeping purposes and/or to complete any transactions that you began prior to requesting a change or deletion.
We share certain categories of information we collect from you in the ways described in this Privacy Policy, including as described below.

In addition, our Business Partners may use Cookies to provide us with anonymous data and information regarding the use of our Services.

Generally, we use Cookies to customize your experience on our Website and to store your login session so you do not have to re-enter your credentials each time you visit the Website.
We may use small computer files that are stored to your computer ("Cookies") to recognize your browser or device, store your user preferences, and track navigation information, such as lists of pages visited, page titles and activities conducted, to help us improve our Website.

data_type: small computer file store to computer
text: We may use small computer files that are stored to your computer ("Cookies") to recognize your browser or device, store your user preferences, and track navigation information, such as lists of pages visited, page titles and activities conducted, to help us improve our Website.

data_type: tiny graphic image file imbed in web page provide presence on web page
text: In limited circumstances we also may use tiny graphic image files imbedded in a web page or email that provide a presence on the web page or email and send back to its home server information from the user's browser ("Web Beacons") to collect anonymous, non-personal information about your use of our Services and the sites of selected sponsors and advertisers, and your use of emails, special promotions or newsletters we send to you.

We may use your demographic data, Traffic Data to customize and tailor your experience through the Services, in emails and in other communications, displaying content that we think you might be interested in and according to your preferences.

We share Personal Information and Traffic Data with Business Partners who assist us by performing core services (such as hosting, billing, fulfillment, or data storage and security) related to our operation of the Services and/or by making certain features available to our users.
